title: M.C. Escher Metamorphosis II Flipbook
description:
Flip the pages with your thumb -- see a little movie in your hands!

Combining the worlds of nature and art, this amazing flipbook achieves one of Escher’s long unfulfilled dreams – to see his work enter the world of animation. Developed from Escher's masterpiece Metamorphosis II.

  • Dimensions: 0.4 x 4 x 2 in.
